comment: It was a class made to teach you how to write papers... You're going to be writing a lot. She gives great feedback for your corrections.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: Super easy class. I am terrible at English and still did well. She is very laid back and just a cool person. Definitely recommend taking this class

Even though attendance is mandatory, she is not very helpful in class. Assignments are pretty easy and she gives you time to complete in class, but spends most of her time talking about pointless stuff with other student. Easy class, but useless professor.
